homeHeader.title: Plan, Launch, & Scale Your Business Seamlessly in IFZA Dubai with Complete 360° Business Setup Solutions
homeHeader.description: Skip the stress of missing documents, banking setup delays, and activity misalignments with our team of seasoned business consultants. We do all the heavy lifting, so you can focus on scaling your business within and beyond IFZA, UAE. Take advantage of the region’s bustling community, competitive corporate tax rates, global access, world-class infrastructure, and booming local and international market.

items.description: After a careful review, we’ll submit your file to IFZA’s authority to verify your eligibility and secure your license so you can start operating.

items.title: Submit Your IFZA Visa Application
items.description: Next, our proficient consultants help you manage investor and employee visa applications, empowering you to get your desired visas.

items.title: Enjoy Post-Licensing Support
items.description: Our expert consultants go beyond traditional business setups, offering seamless corporate bank accounts, IT, and payroll management solutions.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to get an IFZA business license?
items.answer: Most IFZA licenses are issued within 2-4 business days, depending on the type of business activity, document readiness, and location.

items.question: What documents are required to set up a company in IFZA?
items.answer: In general, you’ll need copies of passports (of all shareholders), passport-size photographs, copies of the visa, Emirates IDs, an attested board resolution, a certificate of incorporation, and a valid trade license.

items.question: Do I need a local partner to set up my IFZA company?
items.answer: No! IFZA offers businesses with 100% foreign ownership, meaning you don’t have to worry about getting a local partner.

items.question: Is it necessary to get a physical office to establish an IFZA company?
items.answer: Yes, for your business to get registered in IFZA, you’ll have to secure a physical office space in the region.

items.question: Do I need to visit the UAE to complete the IFZA setup?
items.answer: No, you can complete the entire IFZA setup remotely, including documentation, approval, and license issuance.
